r.d: Mailparse is an extension for parsing and working with email messages. It can deal with rfc822 and rfc2045 (MIME) compliant messages.
r.n: - drop usage of removed mbfl APIs in PHP 8.3 - fix GH-27 MimeMessage::__construct() throws TypeError with $mode=stream - fix GH-21, GH-22, GH-24 segfault in mailparse_msg_parse without mime-version - fix #81403 mailparse_rfc822_parse_addresses drops escaped quotes
